# Blockly Custom Blocks Demo

Interactive web application for creating data processing workflows using visual programming blocks.

## Quick Start

1. Open `index.html` in your browser
2. Drag blocks from the toolbox
3. Connect them to create workflows
4. Click "Generate Code" to see JavaScript
5. Click "Run" to execute and view results

## Features

- 12 custom Blockly blocks for data processing
- Real-time JavaScript code generation
- Live code execution with visual results
- Bar chart visualization
- Auto-save functionality
- Fully responsive design

## Deployment

Perfect for GitHub Pages - just enable Pages in your repository settings.

Built with Vanilla JavaScript + Blockly
